mutants.code:
def second_largest(numbers):
    if len(numbers) <= 2:
        return
    first = max(numbers)
    numbers.remove(first)
    second = max(numbers)
    return second

def second_largest(numbers):
    if len(numbers) >= 2:
        return
    first = max(numbers)
    numbers.remove(first)
    second = max(numbers)
    return second

    if len(numbers) != 2:
        return
    first = max(numbers)
    numbers.remove(first)
    second = max(numbers)
    return second
